explanation: [0-0] In a room, a young lady in white clothing sits on a rug, holding a box of snowman marshmallows. She has a blue pillow on her legs, a Christmas tree and a brown sofa behind her, and blue curtains hanging on the wall.

[0-8] The lady in white holds the box, looking at it repeatedly with a happy face. At this moment, a young man walks from behind the Christmas tree. He wears a yellow top, black shorts, a black sweatband on his head, and his silver-gray hair sticks up. He walks up to the young lady with a smile, reaches out to knock on her head, and the lady in white lowers her head in surprise and displeasure, her right hand blocking her head. The man reaches out again to pull the lady's hair, and the lady in white covers her face with her right arm, her expression pained. Then the silver-haired man takes the marshmallows from the lady in white, points at her with his hand and laughs, then walks away.
